# keyIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A string that identifies the key used to generate the signature.

## Declaration

```swift
var keyIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

You generate and download keys from App Store Connect. See the “KEY ID” column in App Store Connect to use as the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentDiscount/keyIdentifier].

## Identifying the Discount

- **identifier**: A string used to uniquely identify a discount offer for a product.
